title: Amtrak Metroliner
content:
One of the world's fastest self-propelled trains — Amtrak's famous Metroliner has carried over 11.5 million people in 7½ years. Powered by four 640 hp electric traction motors in each car, Metroliner is the speedy way to travel between New Haven, New York and Washington. Luxuriously carpeted coaches, snack bars, Metroclub meal service at your seat. Plus convenient daily scheduling. Surprisingly low fares.
